summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, forwarding an urgent request regarding a potential leak of information about Jeffrey Epstein's death from a hospital. It appears to be internal communication about managing sensitive information.

events.title: Email about potential hospital leak
events.description: An email is sent regarding an urgent request about a potential leak of information concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death from a hospital.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The subject indicates an 'urgent request' about a 'potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death'.
The email is forwarded, suggesting it is part of an internal chain of communication about managing sensitive information.
